name: Ant Labs
description:
Welcome to Ant Labs!

This is a testing grounds to see how ants work together in solidarity with their queen to solve puzzles. So come with us and discover something new!

Controls

WASD: to move
Hold Shift: to move in any direction
C: to call back your Ants

We didn't know what we were doing but we had a blast! Thank you to the StaySafe Jam team for running this event!

Please leave a rating and a comment!

Credits

Programming by Jacob
Art and level design by Yuuki
Music and sounds by Ahjay
